main event: On 27 July 1964, the Coast Guard surface craft USCS Escanaba reported seeing a very bright round white light pass over their ship.
interesting points: The light was described as brilliant white and traveled at high speed,The sighting lasted approximately 2-3 seconds and occurred at an altitude of 200 feet,No sound was heard during the observation,The position of the sighting was recorded as 33.00N 176.30W in the Pacific Ocean,The sighting was logged as part of ongoing UFO reports managed by the Project Blue Book.
sighted object: a very bright round white light
witness description: Crew members of the Coast Guard surface craft USCS Escanaba
